name: Carousel
description: Interactive carousel with sliding/fading transitions and autoplay controls.

use: you need a swipeable carousel with autoplay.
you want custom transitions and dot indicators.

examples.minimal:
Carousel(
  itemCount: 5,
  transition: const SlidingCarouselTransition(),
  itemBuilder: (context, index) => Text('Slide $index'),
)

patterns.title: Controller-driven navigation
patterns.code:
final controller = CarouselController();

Carousel(
  controller: controller,
  itemCount: 3,
  transition: const FadingCarouselTransition(),
  itemBuilder: (context, index) => Text('Card $index'),
)

constructors: `CarouselController` — imperative control for index and animation.

theming: `CarouselTheme` provides theme defaults for spacing and indicators.
accessibility: Ensure focusable content within each item.
dont: Autoplay content users must read for long durations without a pause option.
